Title: Relates to bail for certain offenses involving the sale or possession with intent to sell of a controlled substance or a synthetic opioid
Summary: Authorizes the imposition of bail for certain offenses involving the sale or possession with intent to sell of a controlled substance or a synthetic opioid.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to authorizing bail for certain offenses involving the sale or possession with intent to sell of a controlled substance or a synthetic opioid
